dataflows:
- id: alb-to-webapp
  name: Load Balanced Traffic
  tags: [http, internal-routing]

- id: auth-to-cache

  bidirectional: false
  source: badger-web-app
  destination: authentication-service
- id: webapp-to-cache
  name: Cache Operations
  tags: [caching, redis]
  bidirectional: false
  source: badger-web-app
  destination: redis-cache
- id: webapp-to-database
  name: Database Queries
  tags: [database-access, sql]
  bidirectional: false
  source: badger-web-app
  destination: badger-database
- id: webapp-to-storage
  name: File Operations
  tags: [file-storage, tracking-data]
  bidirectional: false
  source: badger-web-app
  destination: file-storage
- id: webhook-to-database
  name: Webhook Data Updates
  tags: [sql, webhook-updates]
  bidirectional: false
  source: webhook-processor
  destination: badger-database
